name: ai-news-aggregator
description: AI-driven platform that curates news from RSS feeds and APIs, provides AI-powered elaborations with strict attribution

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=backend && npm run test --workspace=frontend && npm run test --workspace=shared
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=backend && npm run lint --workspace=frontend && npm run lint --workspace=shared
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=backend && npm run type-check --workspace=frontend && npm run type-check --workspace=shared
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=backend && npm run clean --workspace=frontend && npm run clean --workspace=shared
scripts.validate: npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run test

author: MacsDickinson
